title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Mixed-Methods Design for Analyzing Higher Education Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language education theory and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the correlation between learning activity design elements and learner experiences using qualitative visual network analysis (VNA).
Learners can systematically collect and analyze declarative performance (PDP) data from participants to inform instructional design.
Learners can holistically evaluate learner satisfaction, blog posts, and task performance data using mixed-methods approaches.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
